messages.home.banner: Apply Machine Learning techniques in Computer Vision to provide automation solutions for businesses with optimal cost
messages.home.content0.title: Our solutions
messages.home.content0.explain: Apply Machine Learning algorithms and technologies using Deep Learning technology in Computer Vision
messages.home.content0.child0_desc: Optimize artificial intelligence models to provide solutions such as facial recognition, age analysis, emotional analysis for one or more faces in photos or videos.
messages.home.content0.child1_desc: Automatically recognize text from images in a variety of documents, allowing you to process millions of documents quickly and automate your workflow.
messages.home.content0.child2_desc: Conducting research on efficient facial recognition solution via camera.
messages.home.content0.child3_desc: Provide optimal solutions, help to realize business ideas quickly or accelerate the digital transformation process of businesses.
messages.home.content1.title: Our products
messages.home.content1.explain: Our experienced and passionate team is constantly working on practical applications to accelerate the digital transformation process and automate businesses’ processes.
messages.home.content1.child0_desc: Combine OCR technology and facial recognition to automatically authenticate faces with photos on identification documents, along with anti-fake techniques to provide a complete digital identity verification solution.
messages.home.content1.child1_desc: Applying OCR technology to identify and extract information from a variety of identification documents allows businesses to automatically process millions of documents quickly and with high accuracy.
messages.home.content1.child2_desc: Apply OCR technology to identify license plates, apply to automatic toll collection and parking management solutions.
messages.home.content1.child3_desc: Apply face recognition technology and high-speed face search along with anti-fake techniques to provide a reliable face authentication solution.
messages.home.content1.child4_desc: Automatically identify facial features such as emotion, age, gender and facial features.
messages.home.content1.child5_desc: Compare two faces and return the result with the same person or not.
messages.home.content1.child6_desc: Identify the same faces in a photo set.
messages.home.content1.child7_desc: Use Agile process and the latest technology platforms to quickly realize business ideas and digital transformation of businesses with optimal time and cost.
messages.home.content1.child8_desc: We are constantly researching new products in the field of AI and Big Data. Stay tuned if you are interested in our products.
messages.home.feature1.title: Fast, easy integration
messages.home.feature1.explain: CVS Vision API provides fast, flexible integration with Restful APIs on both Cloud and On-Premise platforms, suitable for the needs of all businesses, from startups, small and medium enterprises to big businesses.
messages.home.feature1.child_desc0: Integrate quickly with our service and deliver to your customers in just a few hours.
messages.home.feature1.child_desc1: Pay as much as you use, making costs flexible and optimal depending on your needs and your business situation.
messages.home.feature2.child_desc0: All data is processed inside your data center. Your business has right to control over all input and output data.
messages.home.feature2.child_desc1: We customize and implement processes and systems to comply with internal corporate standards and local laws on data security and privacy protection.
messages.home.content10.title: Trusted by the customers from many countries
messages.home.content10.explain: We have been helping businesses from many countries, operating in various fields such as finance, human resources, retail, IoT ... in realizing business ideas and speeding up their digital conversion process with optimal process and cost.
messages.home.feature45.title: Media Coverage
messages.face.banner.title: Face recognition
messages.face.banner.explain: The facial recognition system is a computer application that automatically identifies someone from a digital photo or a video frame from a video source. One of the ways to do this is to compare pre-selected face features from the image and a face database.
messages.face.content1.title: Our products
messages.face.content1.explain: Our experienced and passionate team is constantly working on practical applications to accelerate the digital transformation process and automate businesses’ processes.
messages.face.content1.child0_desc: Combine OCR technology and facial recognition to automatically authenticate faces with photos on identification documents, along with anti-fake techniques to provide a complete digital identity verification solution.
messages.face.content1.child1_desc: Apply face recognition technology and high-speed face search along with anti-fake techniques to provide a reliable face authentication solution.
messages.face.content1.child2_desc: Compare two faces and return the result with the same person or not.
messages.face.content1.child3_desc: Synthesize facial recognition, face clustering, emotion analysis and attractiveness scoring technology to provide smart and automated solutions for managing image collection.
messages.face.content1.child4_desc: Recognize five types of emotions such as happiness, anger, sadness, fear and surprise.
messages.face.content1.child5_desc: Allow age recognition by high-accuracy facial analysis.
messages.face.content1.child6_desc: High-accuracy gender recognition by facial analysis.
messages.face.content1.child7_desc: Give score to images by analyzing their attractiveness.
messages.face.content1.child8_desc: Locate key facial attributes like hair, eyes, nose, and chin.
messages.face.feature4.title: Use Cases
messages.face.feature4.explain: With innovative Artificial Intelligence technology, Facial Recognition APIs from Computer Vision accelerate customer identification process, providing automation solutions for businesses with optimal cost.
messages.face.feature4.child0_desc: Seamless and secure online identity verification, powered by innovative technology.
messages.face.feature4.child1_desc: Too many passwords to remember? Our swift, convenient and highly secure face verification solution is ready to simplify your whole life online.
messages.face.feature4.child2_desc: Advanced solution brings seamless experience and efficiency to the workplace.
messages.face.feature4.child3_desc: Complete automatic solution to keep track of student’s attendance.
messages.face.feature4.child4_desc: Combine face clustering, emotion analysis and attractiveness scoring to make management applications with outstanding features.
messages.face.feature4.child5_desc: Apply Face Landmarks technology to locate key facial attributes then create desired makeover effects. A hairstyle makeover application, for instance, can help to change the color tint of a user’s hair.
messages.ocr.banner.title: Optical character recognition - OCR
messages.ocr.banner.explain: Recognize text and extract precise data from images in documents, allowing business to digitize millions of documents and automate workflow quickly. OCR solution from CVS is easy to apply, customize and integrate into many businesses.
messages.ocr.feature1.title: Our products
messages.ocr.feature1.child_desc0: Applying OCR technology to identify and extract information from a variety of identification documents allows businesses to automatically process millions of documents quickly and with high accuracy.
messages.ocr.feature1.child_desc1: OCR solution from CVS is adept at extracting information from many different types of identification documents such as: Identity Card, Passport, Driver’s License. In addition, we can train our AI to identify other types of documents as required.
messages.ocr.feature3.child_desc0: Our solution is capable of processing large amount of documents with lightning speed and high accuracy.
messages.ocr.feature3.child_desc1: Moreover, solution from CVS allows to restore the format and layout in documents
messages.ocr.feature2.child_desc0: Apply OCR technology to identify license plates, apply to automatic toll collection and parking management solutions.
messages.ocr.feature4.title: Use Cases
messages.ocr.feature4.explain: With innovative Artificial Intelligence technology, Facial Recognition APIs from Computer Vision accelerate customer identification process, providing automation solutions for businesses with optimal cost.
messages.ocr.feature4.child0_desc: Combine OCR technology and facial recognition to automatically authenticate faces with photos on identification documents, along with anti-fake techniques to provide a complete digital identity verification solution.
messages.ocr.feature4.child1_desc: Applying OCR technology to identify and extract information from a variety of identification documents allows businesses to automatically process millions of documents quickly and with high accuracy.
messages.ocr.feature4.child2_desc: Vehicles no longer have to stop for paying toll, this helps to save the travel time and brings convenient experience to the drivers.
messages.ocr.feature4.child3_desc: With Facial Recognition solution, your vehicles are protected from theft and parking fees will be calculated automatically. Parking cards are no longer needed.
messages.web.banner.title: Web & Mobile apps Development
messages.web.banner.explain0: CVS has helped companies of all sizes, from startups to leading businesses, to design and develop web and mobile apps that transform their business.
messages.web.banner.explain1: With shared passion and exceptionally talented designers, engineers and consultants, CVS exploit cutting-edge technology to deliver scalable products.
messages.web.feature1.title: Ours services
messages.web.feature1.child_explain: Our creative development process helps to build cross-platform applications with optimal time and cost
messages.web.feature1.child_desc0: We choose React Native - a revolutionary framework created by Facebook in 2015 to develop mobile applications. React Native allows us to build an iOS and Android app from a single codebase. Using this framework cuts cost and time to build cross-platform applications by more than 50% without losing quality.
messages.web.feature2.child_explain: We develop modern web applications of all scales using innovative technology
messages.web.feature2.child_desc0: With over 10 years of experience in web application development, our team can build on your ideas, whatever they are, then deliver products on time and within budget.
messages.web.feature3.child_explain: We design and develop attractive applications which is enjoyable to use
messages.web.feature3.child_desc0: Our proven design process assures that every feature is built to fulfil your requirements.
messages.web.feature4.child_explain: Our method not only reduces product development cycle time but also assures to reach the scale-up potential of business
messages.web.feature4.child_desc0: Agile is an iterative approach to software development that helps teams deliver value to their customers faster in small, but consumable, increments, instead of betting on final launch. It is designed for responding to change quickly.
messages.web.feature5.title: Our products
messages.web.feature5.child1_desc0: - Catch and save the most beautiful moment of a day - Sunrise and Sunset
messages.web.feature5.child1_desc1: - Track how many sunrise & sunset moments you’ve admired
messages.web.feature5.child1_desc2: - Sun effects powered by Artificial Intelligence
messages.web.feature5.child1_desc3: - Share photos with your own signature
messages.web.feature5.child3_title: ATS Solar power capacity management and forecast system.
messages.web.feature5.child7_desc0: Daily revenue reporting system for CIAS
messages.web.feature5.child7_desc1: - Many types of reports with intuitive visualizations
messages.ekyc.banner.title: eKYC
messages.ekyc.banner.explain0: eKYC is an online customer identification method that requires no face-to-face meetings.
messages.ekyc.banner.explain1: eKYC helps to reduce human resources, provide a better experience for customers and save costs for Business.
messages.ekyc.feature1.title: Complete digital identity verification solution
messages.ekyc.feature1.child0_desc: OCR technology based on AI reads and extracts information on identification documents, helps automate the process of filling information of users, shortening the time of inputting, reducing errors and bringing satisfaction to users. customer.
messages.ekyc.feature1.child1_desc: Face recognition and AI-based face matching technology will verify identity accurately based on selfies and ID photos.
messages.ekyc.feature1.child2_desc: Build multi-layer automated fraud detection and fraud based on AI, meet the highest standards of reliability in many fields such as finance, banking, insurance, telecommunications networks ...
messages.ekyc.feature2.title: Handle identity verification requests for AML and KYC
messages.ekyc.feature2.child_title: Meet your legal obligations and delight your customers
messages.ekyc.feature2.child_desc0: You do not need to compromise user experience to meet the identity verification requirements of KYC and AML regulations.
messages.ekyc.feature2.child_desc1: InstaKYC CVS helps you balance both priorities with user-centric design, adding smoothness to the areas where you need to ask customers for more data to verify their identity. For example, CVS InstaKYC's unique SDK, including glare and blur detection, provides real-time feedback to help users send only high quality images for document verification. Our OCR Autofill extracts data from their identification documents and uses it to automatically pre-fill the registration form, so they don't need to type. And our SDK works on all platforms, from desktops to tablets and smartphones, so users can integrate it into all their products.
messages.ekyc.feature2.child_desc2: Not surprisingly, your customer conversion rate will increase significantly after integrating our solution.
messages.ekyc.feature3.child_title: Customized solutions fit many standard levels of risk
messages.ekyc.feature3.child_desc0: Build a subscription flow that is right for your business. When it comes to identity verification requirements for KYC and AML compliance, you need a risk-based solution that can fit your broader plan to address these regulations. We have created the right profiles for our identity verification platform, so you can adjust CVS InstaKYC to find the right balance between convenience and security to match the level of risk. that you feel comfortable with depending on the risk level of the user's profile.
messages.ekyc.feature3.child_desc1: For example: You can use the Liveness solution via selfie video to make sure the person performing verification is real. With a higher level of reliability, you can request that the identity verification process be done via one-to-one video calls to your employees.
messages.ekyc.feature4.child_title: Reduce operating costs and scale up faster than ever
messages.ekyc.feature4.child_desc0: CVS InstaKYC provides AI-based automation solution, helping businesses reduce operating costs and save a lot of time compared to manual process.
messages.ekyc.feature4.child_desc1: With our solution, you can dynamically scale up or down your business as planned.
messages.gttt.banner.title: ID cards recognition
messages.gttt.banner.explain: Applying OCR technology to identify and extract information from a variety of identification documents allows businesses to automatically process millions of documents quickly and with high accuracy.
messages.gttt.feature1.title: Why choose us?
messages.gttt.feature1.child_title: Identify and extract information from a variety of identification documents
messages.gttt.feature1.child_desc0: OCR solution from CVS is adept at extracting information from many different types of identification documents such as:
messages.gttt.feature1.child_desc6: In addition, we can train our AI to identify other types of documents as required.
messages.gttt.feature2.child_title: A fast and highly reliable solution
messages.gttt.feature2.child_desc0: CVS offers one of the fastest information extraction products, processing 1 extraction in less than 2 seconds on the CPU version and less than 0.7 seconds with the GPU version, which can help businesses process millions of documents remarkably fast.
messages.gttt.feature2.child_desc1: With over 95% accuracy, which has been confirmed by our customers, our solution is one of the most reliable products in the market.
messages.gttt.feature2.child_desc2: Moreover, CVS OCR is capable of handling even difficult cases such as rotated images, poor-quality images and images without corners.
messages.gttt.feature2.child_desc3: We also support automatic detection of counterfeit documents by AI.
messages.gttt.feature3.title: Provide outstanding benefits compared to manual process
messages.gttt.feature3.child_desc0: The manual process requires humans to read information from personal papers then upload it into the system. CVS OCR helps businesses to replace this time-consuming and error-prone procedure with the ability to process automatically, quickly and accurately millions of documents.
messages.gttt.feature4.child_desc0: Simply receive information from CVS OCR then automatically fill in the forms, helping customers to go through the registration process fast while bringing a seamless experience to them.
messages.gttt.feature5.child_title: Reduce operating costs and scale up faster than ever
messages.gttt.feature5.child_desc0: CVS OCR helps businesses reduce labor costs, operating costs and save a lot of time compared to manual process. With our solution, you can dynamically scale up or down your business as planned without depending on a costly and time consuming hiring process. Not only does CVS provide the best OCR solution but CVS also offers one of the most competitive prices for this product.
messages.camera.banner.title: AI Camera
messages.camera.banner.explain: AI Camera is an integrated solution, providing intelligent camera systems using artificial intelligence to automatically recognize, detect events and behaviors with high accuracy. AI Camera solution from CVS meets the needs for security control, data analysis and information from individuals, businesses and organizations.
messages.camera.feature3.title: Giải pháp an ninh kỹ thuật số
messages.camera.feature3.child0_title: Chấm công, điểm danh khuôn mặt
messages.camera.feature3.child0_desc: Công nghệ OCR dựa trên AI đọc và trích xuất các thông tin trên giấy tờ tuỳ thân, giúp tự động hoá quy trình điền thông tin của người dùng, rút ngắn thời gian nhập liệu, giảm thiểu sai sót và mang lại sự hài lòng cho khách hàng.
messages.camera.feature3.child1_title: Giám sát người ra vào thang máy, tòa nhà
messages.camera.feature3.child1_desc: Công nghệ nhận dạng khuôn mặt và so khớp khuôn mặt dựa trên AI sẽ xác minh danh tính một cách chính xác dựa vào ảnh selfie và ảnh trên giấy tờ tuỳ thân.
messages.camera.feature3.child2_title: Xác định biển số, lưu lượng xe
messages.camera.feature3.child2_desc: Xây dựng nhiều lớp tự động phát hiện gian lận và giả mạo dựa trên AI, đáp ứng các tiêu chuẩn cao nhất độ tin cậy trong nhiều lĩnh vực như tài chính, ngân hàng, bảo hiểm, mạng viễn thông...
